DOC.brief_summary: During coronary angiography , lumen artery image intravascular ultrasound ( IVUS ) necessary determine plaque extension composition , lesion length luminal reference diameter . We aim investigate accuracy , feasibility , safety value novel method co-registration IVUS coronary angiographic image .
DOC.brief_title: Novel Method Real Time Co-Registration IVUS Coronary Angiography
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo routine coronary angioplasty Cardiogenic shock Acute myocardial infarction
